newsitem.title: UK: RUGBY UNION-ENGLISH CLUBS POSTPONE BREAKAWAY.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-ENGLISH CLUBS POSTPONE BREAKAWAY.

text.p: England's leading clubs have postponed Friday's scheduled breakaway from the Rugby Football Union (RFU), improving the chances of a settlement to the long-running dispute between the two sides.

A meeting between the RFU and the English Professional Rugby Union Clubs (EPRUC) is scheduled for the same day in a final attempt to solve the power struggle which has threatened to strip the national team of its top players.
